name: Thunder and Eternity
title: Dream of Evanescent Eternity
desc: "It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

skills.desc: Convert all your Elemental Dice to Omni Element.(You must have at least 2 Inazuman characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
